item.title: Project Management
item.dc:creator: xmoze-jihad
item.content:encoded:
Modern software for project management

Xmoze is a cloud-project management software, that helps you plan your projects, track work efficiently, and collaborate with your team, wherever they are.

Start a free trial for-15 days

Trusted by 1600+ of the world's most popular companies

All the essential features for working productively

Proper planning of the project

Project planning is a discipline addressing how to complete a project in a certain timeframe

Discover more

Executing & monitoring the project

Project planning is a discipline addressing how to complete a project in a certain timeframe

Discover more

Better control of the project

Project planning is a discipline addressing how to complete a project in a certain timeframe

Discover more

Manage team and track progress with the online

With automatic online project scheduling & drag-and-drop simplicity, our project planning software has the best of the team management software. Work alone or create a workspace for your business team.

Plan the projects, closely track your tasks, collaborate with your team efficiently, and finish successful projects like you never even done.

Get Started 0 % Time saved on management 0 % Rise in teamwork efficiency 0 % Less missed deadlines 0 % Expenses saved all projects

Easy interface to increase your profits and business

Xmoze gives you the tools & reports you need to maximize resources and never miss a billable minute again. Get a bird’s eye view of every project, from milestones to project planning, budgeting and more.

Download and create an account just onek click

Plan your project activities and add takes easily

Manage team and track progress on one page

Flexible pricing plans for any type of project

Starter Plan

$5/Per Month

Brand for new to project management? Start here.
  • 10 GB Disk Space
  • 2 Projects Complete
  • Project Gantt Chart
  • Limited storage space
  • Free Custom Domain
Start a free trial

Basic Plan

$20/Per Month

All the project management basics and clear task in one.
  • 500 GB Disk Space
  • 5 Projects Complete
  • Project Gantt Chart
  • Limited storage space
  • Free Custom Domain
Start a free trial

Popular Plan

$49/Per Month

Brand for new to project management? Start here.
  • 800GB Disk Space
  • Unlimited projects
  • Project Gantt Chart
  • Limited storage space
  • Free Custom Domain
Start a free trial

Premium Plan

$99/Per Month

For big organizations who wants advanced security
  • 1000 GB Disk Space
  • Unlimited projects
  • Global Gantt Chart
  • Limited storage space
  • Free Custom Domain
Start a free trial

Easily integrate into tools you already use

See all Integrations

Flexible pricing plans for any type of project

See more client's stories

“Employees track their time in xmoze, and manage clients’ budgets… It’s like nothing I’ve ever seen. We’ve get more visibility over the team’s as well as more visibility terms of who owns a task and exactlydone.”

Scott Swanson

CEO @ example company

“Xmoze consistently fill expectations. Teamwork automatically schedules and assigns all the tasks working backward from the date of the presentation. attractive interface for tracking tasks, dependencies, and resources.”

Jay Baer

Founder @ Company

“In just one year, we’ve doubled in our organic leads & doubled our US traffic, even with a smaller team. We could not have done that without xmoze. help us stay on track & keep discovering ways that we can improve our performance.”

Seth Smith

Head of SEO @ XYZ

Create your project in minutes with us! and get started for free

Streamline work plans. Keep your team happy with a balanced workload. Delight clients with on-time delivery. 100% features available on free trial

Start a free trial for-15 days
  • No credit card is required. You can cancel anytime
